metadata.name: Invoke-Obfuscation Via Use MSHTA
metadata.comment: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via use MSHTA in Scripts

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('set')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('&&')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('mshta')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('vbscript:createobject')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.run')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('(window.close)')))

output.summary: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via use MSHTA in Scripts
